title: Progressive Web App
description: My project, Unipass, is a Progressive Web App offering a native-app-like experience, offline capability, and cross-platform accessibility.

title: Token Bound Account
description: Experience the future of digital asset management with our Token-Bound Wallet. This cutting-edge solution not only enables you to buy and sell NFTs but also empowers you to transfer your entire wallet seamlessly through the exchange of a unique Account NFT. Effortlessly share or sell your complete digital portfolio with just a single transaction. Now, with our Progressive Web App (PWA) service, you can access your digital assets anytime, anywhere, right from your web browser. Dive into the world of crypto with ease, speed, and security.
